Name: Match and rank candidates based on job or CVs
Description: This feature is about adding a candidate matching and ranking function that allows clients to match candidates on a list based on:Job description providedCandidate CV/resume provided ("show me similar candidates"

Name: Resume reformatting
Description: This feature allows you to parse and reformat resumes. You can:Custom brand resumesAnonymize resumesChoose from resume templates

Name: Custom website redirections on lists based on themes
Description: Apply different themes to lists and redirect users to different websites

Name: Default notification settings for Lists
Description: Under "Client Notification"  you can set default notification preferences at the list level. Additionally, Admins and Owners can configure these settings at the company level.

Name: More custom fields
Description: Added support for:Labels/Tags with colors

Name: Add tour for new end clients
Description: The first time an end client is visiting a list  we will show a tour for them to guide them through the navigation.

Name: SEO Optimized Lists
Description: This feature is about adding a setting that will allow you to control if a list should be indexed by search engines or not. It will also introduce several SEO improvements for cases where people want a list to be indexed by search engines.

Name: Highlight new candidates
Description: This feature will add a "Green dot" to candidates on your list that clients have not viewed yet.

Name: Auto-Assign Users
Description: We're excited to introduce our new Auto-Assign feature  designed to improve clarity byÂ automatically assigning collaborating usersÂ to lists based on specific actions. Actions that will trigger auto-assignment include: Changing a list's statusSharing a listAdding a candidateUpdating a candidate's statusMessaging via the messenger feature

Name: End clients (Address Book)
Description: This feature allows you to sync your end users from Bullhorn to Candidately. You can then select them during the sharing process if you want to share a list with them.

Name: Multiple languages
Description: Support for more languages than english

Name: Add a candidate to a list without a CV
Description: This feature will enable a user to add a candidate to a list without the CV. This feature will also be available when importing candidates from Bullhorn

Name: Custom tab on Candidate record
Description: In addition to a custom tab in Bullhorn that we have on jobs today  this feature is about adding a custom tab to candidate records. It allows for a quick sync to a list when a candidate should be added to a list that is unrelated to a specific job.

Name: Reporting section
Description: A new section to pull reports on:When a candidate was addedWhen interviews were requestedWhen candidates were declinedWhen lists were shared and to whometc.

Name: Track anonymous activity on lists
Description: Currently  we only track the activity on lists when the people viewing the lists are logged in (you sent them an invite or they confirmed their email).This feature is about adding support for anonymous traffic.

Name: Custom JavaScript on list
Description: This feature allows you to add a custom JS code to your lists like a Google Analytics tracking link.

Name: List previewer
Description: We will add a new list previewer that allows you to simulate different list and CV access settings to see how your list will behave toward your clients.

Name: Custom file field: Select files from Bullhorn
Description: This feature allows you to select files from Bullhorn when uploading additional documents on candidates on the custom file field.

Name: Folders
Description: This feature is about adding folders for better list management.

Name: Custom fields: Rate
Description: Support for custom rate fields
